about_the_game:
Inconvenience Store offers a unique experience combining the management of store resources and strategic thinking aimed at maximizing profits, with real-time action, because as the only employee in this business among the dead, you can only rely on yourself. The underworld awaits if you twiddle your thumbs.
As your days change and the events unfold, you're tasked with responding to customer requests, organizing shelves, replenishing stock and simply keeping the store on its feet in the face of any problems that may arise. Your objective here is money, because that's how you'll be able to buy your ticket to Heaven.


Store resource management : From money to stock to delivery. It's up to you to manage this juicy business among the dead that is the Inconvenience Store. You'll also have to arrange the merchandise according to current trends, and do everything you can to make a profit.

Customer care : Customers are your only source of profit, so you'll have to take care of their requests and collect as much as you can. Good store management is essential here. A well-prepared store means customers will quickly find what they're looking for themselves.

Pacts for more money : Make a pact with the demon Yhul-Ghurt, hidden in the store's cold room. In exchange for increased difficulty via in-game events, Yhul-Ghurt offers you a money multiplier at the end of each day.

A unique world of the dead : Immerse yourself in a world of the dead, far removed from the gray and cobwebs of sad ghosts and creepy skeletons.
Instead, make way for a colorful universe, inhabitants with unique characters and a store more akin to an attraction than a real convenience store.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 (64-bit) or later
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-550
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTS 450
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 (64-bit) or later
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-2300
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 950
  • Storage: 4 GB available space

short_description: Take on the role of a spirit condemned to forced labor in a store in The Afterlife​​ Your salvation is to buy a ticket to Paradise and escape by any means necessary. ​If you fail to manage the store, Hell will be waiting for you.
